publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-109 Mr Keith Raffan: Independent Public Inquiry into Iraq Intelligence Dossier—That the Parliament calls upon the Prime Minister to establish an independent public inquiry into the intelligence dossier on weapons of mass destruction, which was used by Her Majesty’s Government to justify the invasion of Iraq.

S2M-109 Mr Keith Raffan: Independent Public Inquiry into Iraq Intelligence Dossier—That the Parliament calls upon the Prime Minister to establish an independent public inquiry into the intelligence dossier on weapons of mass destruction, which was used by Her Majesty’s Government to justify the invasion of Iraq. Supported by: Tommy Sheridan*
S2M-109 Independent Public Inquiry into Iraq Intelligence Dossier (lodged on 4 June 2003) Christine Grahame*
S2M-109 Independent Public Inquiry into Iraq Intelligence Dossier (lodged on 4 June 2003) Donald Gorrie*
S2M-109 Independent Public Inquiry into Iraq Intelligence Dossier (lodged on 4 June 2003) Chris Ballance*, Elaine Smith*
